knimeNode.name: ImzML Reader (Column Spectrums)
knimeNode.shortDescription: This node is used for reading a whole imzML dataset into memory where each column is a spectrum. Please ensure that the imzML and ibd files have the same name and are in the same directory.

fullDescription.intro: This imzML reader loads in an imzML dataset into memory where each column is a spectrum, and each row is an mz intensity., please ensure that the imzML and ibd files are in the same directory.

ports.outPort: This port is the m/z values.
This port outputs the intensity of the corresponding m/z values.
